name: Hot Spikes
description:
Collect the Markers, don't fall into the liquid!

Boost down to break blocks

Keyboard Controls

WASD - Movement

J - Boost 

K - Jump / Stick To Block

Alt + Enter / F11 - Toggle Fullscreen

Escape - Pause

Controller Controls

Left Stick - Movement

L1, R1, X/Square - Boost

A / X - Jump / Stick To Block

Select - Toggle Fullscreen

Start - Pause
